item.title: Marvelous
item.description: The Origin Story of Marvelous Marvelous is Spring Boot / Java application that is designed to interact with the Marvel comic book API. I started working on this app back in the Fall of 2018, when I first joined Target Corp as an Engineer. The team I joined maintained a collection of Spring Boot based services, mostly written in Groovy. At that point in my career I had been working on a tech stack that included PHP, AngularJS, MySQL and Apache.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Who Is Thomas Johander? I’m a software engineer working in a large, Fortune 50 enterprise. I work on a team that maintains an ever-growing portfolio of mircoservices, mostly REST APIs. The tech stack I work with day-to-day includes: Spring Boot Kotlin Groovy Spock Testing Framework Gradle Spring Web Flux MongoDB Kafka Elasticsearch Why I Created This Blog I came to coding by way of a (amazing) Full Stack Javascript Bootcamp.
